contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Benin}} {{stack|[[File:Benin departements.png|thumb|Departments of Benin]]}} [[Benin]] is divided into 12 [[Department (subnational entity)|departments]] (French: ''départements''), and subdivided into 77 [[commune (subnational entity)|communes]] (see [[Communes of Benin]]). In 1999, the previous six departments were each split into two halves, forming the current 12. The new six departments have been assigned a capital in 2008. #[[Alibori Department|Alibori]]* #[[Atakora Department|Atakora]] #[[Atlantique Department|Atlantique]] #[[Borgou Department|Borgou]] #[[Collines Department|Collines]]* #[[Kouffo Department|Kouffo]]* #[[Donga Department|Donga]]* #[[Littoral Department|Littoral]]* #[[Mono Department|Mono]] #[[Ouémé Department|Ouémé]] #[[Plateau Department|Plateau]]* #[[Zou Department|Zou]] <small><nowiki>*</nowiki>Formed in 1999</small> == See also == * [[Communes of Benin]] * [[ISO 3166-2:BJ]], the [[International Organization for Standardization|ISO]] codes for the departments of Benin. == References == * {{statoids|id=ubj|title=Departments of Benin}} * {{fr icon}} http://www.ambassade-benin.org/article20.html * {{fr icon}} [http://www.insae-bj.org/doc/Publications/Projection_Population_Benin_par_Departement_2002_A_2030.pdf Projections De La Population Du Benin Par Departement] {{Departments of Benin}} {{Articles on first-level administrative divisions of African countries}} <!--Categories--> [[Category:Departments of Benin| ]] [[Category:Subdivisions of Benin]] [[Category:Lists of country subdivisions|Benin, Departments]] [[Category:Country subdivisions of Africa|Benin 1]] [[Category:First-level administrative country subdivisions|Departments, Benin]] [[Category:Benin geography-related lists]]
